solution_line_template: First, find the total number of points Carl needs to earn across all the tests by multiplying his desired average by the number of tests: {desired_average} * {num_tests} = <<{desired_average}*{num_tests}={total_needed_points}>>{total_needed_points} marks.

Then subtract all Carl's previous test scores to find the last score he needs to earn: {total_needed_points} - {test1_score} - {test2_score} - {test3_score} = <<{total_needed_points}-{test1_score}-{test2_score}-{test3_score}={last_test_score}>>{last_test_score} marks.
